name: sebastian
characteristics: Reserved, introspective, and somewhat rebellious. Values independence and personal space. Often drawn to solitary hobbies and night-time activities.

name: abigail
characteristics: Adventurous, bold, and curious. Thrives on challenges and enjoys exploring the unknown. Has a playful streak and a taste for the unconventional.

name: robin
characteristics: Friendly, energetic, and optimistic. Loves helping others and approaches life with enthusiasm. Quick to start new projects and enjoys social interaction.

name: harvey
characteristics: Gentle, introverted, and caring. Enjoys quiet moments, thoughtful conversations, and calm activities. Tends to avoid confrontation and prefers harmony.

name: leah
characteristics: Creative, free-spirited, and deeply connected to nature. Finds beauty in simplicity and often seeks inspiration from her surroundings. Warm and open-hearted.
